REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A f1482 reute d f BC-ENSERCH-<ENS>-TO-REDE 04-03 0050

TEXT.TITLE: ENSERCH <ENS> TO REDEEM DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: Enserch Corp said it called for redemption on May 4, 1987, all of its outstanding 16-3/4 pct sinking fund debentures due 2007. The redemption is pursuant to the optional redemption provisions of the indenture at a price of 111.981 pct of part. Reuter
